text: Clarence George "Clarrie" Bacon (9 November 1889 – 6 November 1954) was an English professional footballer who played as a Winger. ==References== Category:1889 births Category:1954 deaths Category:People from Grimsby Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Haycroft Rovers F.C. players Category:Grimsby Rangers F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Cleethorpes Town F.C. players Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:North Shields F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Clarrie Bacon
